review: The Fire Stick I find a bit tedious to navigate as compared to Roku, which is user friendly and a breeze to use. I have only had the Fire Stick for about a week and will get use to the navigation as time goes on I am sure.
author: Tracie Craig

review: I really like the Amazon Firestick. Well worth the money.
author: MELANIE CLERVEAU

review: Seems to be pretty cool. If I had a glitch initially, it was in figuring out my own TV menu. Other than that, it seemed to pick up our wireless pretty efficiently. Now, all we have to do is actually watch something with it.....................Pretty cool. I guess if I had one complaint, it will be that I ordered the "voice activated" remote for extra money and I think that's a little chintzy because now I have the remote that came with it AND the voice one. Will they take back the original remote and issue me a refund for it? I think not. So, now I have a useless remote sitting around. They should have just given you the option at the time of ordering to order the remote with or without the feature and charged a $5 upcharge for the feature.
author: David Loring

review: Don't like it at all, the streaming services through my Sony Blue Ray player are much faster
author: Clayton hall

review: Easy to set up. Love it !
